casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Harry Sharod JAMES No. 514PA11-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Sandra Wallace-Smith, Special Deputy Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Harry Sharod James, for James, Harry Sharod

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 30th of October 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of October 2018 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of October 2018 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
